MYSTIFIED.Definition: was so strange and confusing that it was difficult to understand

HARDWIRED.Definition: if something is hardwired, it's a natural part of someone's character or being

STIMULANTS.Definition: substances that cause you to stay awake and heighten your senses

STANDBY.Definition: ready for use, but not in use

OBESITY.Definition: the state of being extremely fat

IMMUNE SYSTEM.Definition: the system protecting your body against disease and infections

ANALYTICAL.Definition: relating to the ability to think and understand things

HOMEOSTASIS.Definition: the ability for a creature to keep an internal balance

TIMER.Definition: a clock that tells you when a particular amount of time has passed

DEPRIVED.Definition: if you are deprived of something, you haven't had it for a long time

CIRCADIAN.Definition: relating to a period of 24 hours

DISRUPT.Definition: cause a change from the normal routine

PROPONENTS.Definition: people who support something or someone
